Input Counter#

Component with input to choose numeric values and describe quantity.

1

You can add is-active class to disable each button. 

<section class="input-counter">
    <div class="input-counter_content">
        <button class="input-counter_button">-</button>
        <span class="input-counter_value">1</span>
        <button class="input-counter_button">+</button>
    </div>
    <div class="input-counter_loading"></div>
</section>
